0.post_text:
We are here live at the all-new BMW iPerformance official launch at Performance Motors! Experience our range of 5 BMW plug-in hybrids, which take driving to a whole new level.

Take part in exciting activities such as the hourly Slot Track Challenge and the Robotics Coding workshops by In3labs Robotics Coding, and indulge in delectable treats by Loco Loco, Abbie's Coffeehouse, The Raclette Factory, and Central Perk SG. What’s more, assemble your very own Mini Salt Water-Powered Toy Car at our Kid’s Corner.

Join us at Performance Motors, 303 Alexandra Road, this weekend (30 Sep and 1 Oct 2017). See you there! #BMWiPerformance

1.post_text:
We are excited to launch the all-new BMW iPerformance! Get up close to our range of 5 BMW plug-in hybrids, which take driving to a whole new level, at Performance Motors this weekend (30 Sep and 1 Oct 2017).

What’s more, indulge in delectable treats by Loco Loco, Abbie's Coffeehouse, The Raclette Factory, and Central Perk SG, as you take part in exciting activities such as the hourly Slot Track Challenge and the Robotics Coding workshops by In3labs Robotics Coding. Furthermore, you can assemble your very own Mini Salt Water-Powered Toy Car at our Kid’s Corner. 

We hope to see you there! #BMWiPerformance

comments.message:
The mobility industry will significantly transform 3 things:-

1. From combustion to electrification,
2. From unconnected to connected, 
3. From manual driving to autonomous

PML has checked off 2 out of 3. Today, we present to our fellow Singaporeans; emissions-free and connected options.

comments.message: Enriching the young, defining the experience... 👍

3.post_text:
Fancy building your own Mini Robot? Join us at our complimentary Robotics Coding Workshop by IN3LABS at our BMW iPerformance Official Launch this coming weekend (30 Sep & 1 Oct 2017).

Perfect for your little ones, enjoy fun activities such as Play Dough Circuit, Building a Mini Robot or Circuit Sticker at our Robotics Coding Workshop! Sign up by clicking on the link below. Limited slots are available.

4.post_text:
The future is charged and ready to go. Today, with the technology transfer and design features from BMW i, the all-new BMW iPerformance, a range of BMW plug-in hybrids, takes driving to a whole new level.
 
Now, it’s your turn to drive the future. Visit Performance Motors or call 6653 8051 to book a test drive today.
 
The BMW iPerformance plug-in hybrids include the BMW 225xe iPerformance Active Tourer, BMW 330e iPerformance, BMW 530e iPerformance, BMW 740Le xDrive iPerformance, and BMW X5 xDrive40e iPerformance. #BMWiPerformance

5.post_text:
We are counting down to the official launch of our new BMW iPerformance cars this coming weekend (30 Sep & 1 Oct 2017).
 
We have a line-up of exciting activities for you and your family – take part in the Scalextrics Challenge, interact with our BMW iPerformance Interactive Wall, explore Robotics Coding workshops by In3labs Robotics Coding, be greeted by the FURO-D robot by Infinium Robotics, and assemble a BMW Mini Salt Water-Powered Toy Car at our Kid's Corner.
 
What’s more, you can indulge in delectable treats by Loco Loco, Abbie's Coffeehouse, The Raclette Factory, and Central Perk SG. 

Come on down to Performance Motors at 303 Alexandra Road this weekend to find out more and experience the whole range of 5 BMW Plug-in Hybrids. We hope to see you there! #BMWiPerformance

comments.message: We look forward to serving melty gooey raclette cheese this weekend 🧀😉
A taste of things to come

7.post_text:
Introducing the new BMW i3, which now gives you more driving range of up to 330km* with range extender. 

Packed with an enhanced 94Ah lithium-ion battery (50% more than before), you can enjoy more driving pleasure on a single charge. Visit Performance Motors or call 6653 8051 to book a test drive today.

*based on NEDC figures.

8.post_text: Ready for the future? A new kind of driving pleasure is arriving to Singapore soon. Experience the whole range of 5 BMW Plug-in Hybrids this coming weekend (30 Sep & 1 Oct 2017) at Performance Motors. Stay tuned to our Facebook page to find out more! #BMWiPerformance

9.post_text:
BMW is the Official Car of Miss Universe Singapore 2017. As a BMW owner, you can enjoy 20% off tickets to the Miss Universe Singapore 2017 Grand Finale.

Savour the resplendent beauty of this special occasion while you enjoy a sumptuous 5-course dinner and scintillating on-stage entertainment.

Who do you think will be crowned Miss Universe Singapore 2017?

10.post_text:
Life is an adventure. Make sure you are prepared to tackle it head-on with the BMW X3 and BMW X4. Sporting sleek designs and powerful performance, these BMWs will conquer the roads or carve new ones to take you wherever your passion lies.

Own a BMW with $0 price increase despite COE price hike* today. Visit Performance Motors or call 6653 8051 to book a test drive.

*Terms and Conditions apply.

11.post_text:
Fuelled with excitement, 20 of our customers set off to Malaysia on 8 September 2017 for the Performance Motors Escape the City 2017, Food Trail Edition. Covering up to 300 kilometres, the participants satisfied their taste buds with local delights at Kluang RailCoffee and Jade Garden Seafood Corner. 

Watch the video to find out more about their exhilarating drive up north!

12.post_text:
Thank you all who joined us in the unveiling of the new BMW G 310 R, a compact powerhouse that packs a mean punch and is the essence of riding pleasure. 

As the Official Automobile of Miss Universe Singapore 2017, we are glad to have the contestants to meet everyone last Sunday! Check out the photos here.

Own the newest generation of the BMW 7 Series at exclusive trade-in rates. Book a test drive now at http://www.pml.com.sg/tradein-7ser-fallinloveagain/

14.post_text:
The BMW 5 Series is a modern business sedan with the beating heart of an athlete. It unites intelligence business assistance systems with legendary BMW engineering and design.

Now available in 520i, you can truly take sheer driving pleasure to the next level. Experience the BMW 520i from $1,550 per month*, and enjoy BMW Service Inclusive and BMW Extended Warranty for 5 years*.

Visit 303 Alexandra Road for a test drive today.

*Terms and Conditions apply.
